body.name: Meat Cleaver Boning Knife Hand Forged Butcher Chef Knife High Carbon Steel Full Tang with Leather Sheath Outdoor Knife for Kitchen Camping
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 5 hrs 11 mins
features: 【Multipurpose】The Knife full length is 10.7 Inch and equipped with a portable soft leather sheath, which is suitable for everyday carry. You can wear a sharp knife and never increase your load. It is suitable for camping, BBQ, hunting, adventuring, hiking. The knife also can easily handle your daily tasks of slicing, dicing by cutting chicken, lamb chops, steaks, vegetables and fruits. It’s definitely your practical assistant no matter when you are indoor or outdoor.

【Premium Quality】First you need to know this is a butcher knife handmade forged from high carbon steel, high carbon steel has a better ability to maintain sharp edges and greatly improves the hardness of the butcher knife. It will assist you with every perfect cut and reasonable maintenance after each use, it will last a long lifetime.

【Sharp Blade】The Boning Knife Blade has been carefully forged, ground and polished by experienced craftsman with good sharpness, hardness, durability and excellent cutting performance. Special hammered dimples on the surface of blade enhanced non-stick properties.

【Ergonomic Design】Ergonomic handle provides non-slip and comfortable grip, so you won’t feel tired for using such a long time. Finger hole on blade provides a secure grip for excellent control between blade and handle while slicing and dicing.

【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】This feather boning knife is suitable as a gift to parents and friends. We also provide a lifetime warranty, any problems, let us know, our service team 24 hours online to help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp and durable
reviews.reviewText: The VARLEA Meat Cleaver Boning Knife is a hand-forged masterpiece designed for chefs and outdoor enthusiasts alike. Crafted from high-carbon steel, this full-tang knife offers exceptional durability and sharpness. With its versatile design, it serves as an excellent butcher and chef knife, making it an essential tool in the kitchen and during camping adventures.Included is a premium leather sheath that ensures safe storage and transport, highlighting VARLEA's commitment to both functionality and style. Elevate your culinary and outdoor experiences with this finely crafted and reliable meat cleaver boning knife.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Four stars on the knife, One star on the sheath.
reviews.reviewText: I like this knife quite a bit the quality is good and the blade is heavy and sharp. This will work well for butchering game like deer and elk. Although I like the knife itself, I did not care for the sheath so much because the leather is very thin. I would not trust this sheath to do anything but maybe to minimally protect the blade when it is in a drawer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My husband used to work in a 5 star kitchen. He is also, like most men, a fan of cool knives. This one works beautifully both for cooking and as an interesting piece in his collection. I would 100% recommend this item either for yourself or as a gift for someone else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a beautiful knife for collection
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Knife and I am extremely impressed with its performance. The knife is incredibly sharp (need double care to handle it) and the hand forging ensures superior strength and durability.It has made my meat preparation tasks efficient and precise. . This is a beautiful knife for collection . Highly recommend this exceptional knife!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love the knife but the sheath not so much.
reviews.reviewText: I have made a few knives and sheaths in my time. I really like this knife, the craftsmanship is nice and the material seems to be of high quality but the sheath is lacking to say the least. It is very thin and cheap and does not even compare to the quality of the knife. I guess it will be okay just sitting around the house or in your kitchen but I'm sure it would not last long if you were trying to carry it around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good knife/cleaver with style
reviews.reviewText: This is one of those items that looks far better in person than in the photos. It arrived fairly sharp (I'll work on the edge some myself). It's got some good heft to it and just looks really nice. In use it seemed reasonably balanced and is surprisingly good as a general purpose knife. It is certainly good for boning. I don't know that I'd try cutting a larger bone with it, but I didn't get it for that. The sheath isn't the best, but will serve as a blade guard at least until I get the magnetic knife rail put in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love these Viking-themed knives!
reviews.reviewText: I love these Viking-themed knives! They just give your kitchen a whole new look!This is a high-carbon stainless steel knife with a very durable handle. When you hold this knife in your hand, you just get a very solid durable feeling with it, and it just looks great too!It's very sharp and if you care for it as directed, I would expect it to hold its edge very well.This kind of knife would also make a great gift because it's a very unique style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Fairly sharp knife but with some good weight behind it for cutting through ribs and bones. Looks sophisticated with a nice design on the outside of the blade. Solid wood handle feels good in your hand.
